p.1: Hiring for a global leading hedge fund based in New York who apply a quantitative and systematic approach to investment management, which is heavily reliant on technology.
p.3: The day to day role will require have you working with some of the top talent across the world, previously being hired at Google, Amazon, and Facebook just to name a few. You will be working in a collaborative team that works within a fast paced environment but is able to keep it relaxed in order to build some of the most efficient trading platforms globally.
p.5: There will be an above the market rate salary package provided alongside progression within your career. All aided with the experience of working with like minded individuals.

li: 2+ years professional experience with an object oriented language that is happy to proceed with C++ (e.g Java, C++, Python, C# =E2=80=A6..)
li.1: A Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or a related discipline
li.2: Ability to work in a face paced environment
li.3: 2+ years experience as a software Engineer/Developer
